    • Method Detail

      • overridePendingTransaction

        public static void overridePendingTransaction(android.app.Activity activity,
                                              int entryAnimation,
                                              int exitAnimation)
        This is to be called when a startActivity() is called. It will add an animation to the screens entering and exiting
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity that this is being called from. Note, if in a fragment, please make sure to cast it accordingly [IE: ((MainActivity)getActivity) ]
        entryAnimation - The animation for the NEW activity to display when coming in / entering
        exitAnimation - The animation for the OLD activity to display when leaving / exiting

      • animateMyView

        public static <E extends android.view.View> void animateMyView(E view,
                                                               java.lang.Integer mDuration,
                                                               com.daimajia.androidanimations.library.Techniques tech)
        Animates a view.
        Type Parameters:
        E - A View object (IE EditText, TextView, Button, View, etc)
        Parameters:
        view - View to be animated
        mDuration - Duration (in milliseconds) of animation. 1000 would be 1 second
        tech - The animation to actually be done. Obtain technique like so: Techniques tech1 = Techniques.Wobble;

      • animateMyView

        public static <E extends android.view.View> void animateMyView(E view,
                                                               java.lang.Long mDuration,
                                                               com.daimajia.androidanimations.library.Techniques tech)

      • animateMyView

        public static void animateMyView(android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder holder,
                                 java.lang.Integer duration,
                                 com.daimajia.androidanimations.library.Techniques techniques)
        Animates a holder within a recyclerview
        Parameters:
        holder - The holder to animate
        duration - Duration in milliseconds. IF null passed, will default to 500 milliseconds
        techniques - The technique to use in the animation
